mapper.select: SELECT t0.id as userId, t1.account as account FROM zgk_user_info t0, zgk_user_account t1 WHERE t0.id = t1.id AND t0.qqUserId = #{openId}
select acc.account,info.provinceId,info.cityId,info.countyId from zgk_user_account acc left join zgk_user_info info on acc.userId=info.id where acc.id=#{accountId} limit 0, 1
mapper.update: UPDATE zgk_user_account SET isRegisterXueTang=#{isRegisterXueTang} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: select od.order_no as orderNo, od.status as payStatus, od.goods_count as productNum, od.product_type as productType, od.unit_price as unitPrice, pro.name as productName from zgk_order od LEFT JOIN zgk_ali_product pro on od.product_type=pro.type where od.user_id=#{userId} and od.order_no = #{orderNo}
